trans-unit.source: Launch media using a Deeplink request, or with a supported app.

trans-unit.source: These settings only affect the music player

trans-unit.source: Note: Settings will take effect next song

trans-unit.source: Deeplink Error: An internal error has occurred while processing that Deeplink!
trans-unit.target: Deeplink Error: An internal error has occurred while processing that Deeplink!

trans-unit.source: Media Type Error: Metadata can only be used if media is already playing
trans-unit.target: Media Type Error: Metadata can only be used if media is already playing

trans-unit.source: Media Queue Error: There was an issue processing the queued media
trans-unit.target: Media Queue Error: There was an issue processing the queued media

trans-unit.source: Media URL Error: There was no media URL provided
trans-unit.target: Media URL Error: There was no media URL provided

trans-unit.source: Media Type Error: The Media Type provided is unknown
trans-unit.target: Media Type Error: The Media Type provided is unknown

trans-unit.source: Deeplink Error: The request didn't contain valid data
trans-unit.target: Deeplink Error: The request didn't contain valid data
